abstract  java.lang.String Host.getContentsDetectCharset(java.lang.String file, CharsetDeciderDecoder cdd)
          gets the contents of the file as single unicode string, automatically detecting the character set and converting the bytes to a string (supports exotic charsets like EUC-CN or SHIFT_JS).

abstract  ByLineReader Host.readFileDetectCharset(java.lang.String file, CharsetDeciderDecoder cdd)
          opens a file to be read line by line, automatically detecting charset
